title: Walmartâ€™s Onn Android TV streamer gets another update w/ January 2022 security patch
content:
Super-affordable Android devices are not hard to find, but all too often they’re essentially abandoned immediately with very few updates. Last year, Walmart debuted the most affordable Android TV streamers ever under its Onn brand, and yet another update that delivers the latest January 2022 security patch.

more…

The post Walmart’s Onn Android TV streamer gets another update w/ January 2022 security patch appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Walmart is now rolling out an update to its Onn-branded Android TV streamers that delivers the January 2022 security patch.
